MANSUR|Where do we begin the search for Sergo?

FOREIGNER|He could be anywhere. I was driving almost straight through and didn't see anything like him. Maybe I just missed it. It's damn hard to notice anything when you're fighting off a bunch of madmans!
HAMZA|Hell won't be easier than this. No way out but through. Let's go.
FOREIGNER|Looks like my pack's still with him…
MANSUR|Wanna check what's inside the pack?
HAMZA|What the hell is this thing… Wait. This might actually be the blocker!
HAMZA|You know what? Let's leave it here. If it really is the blocker, there has to be another way to fix this mess. I just don't believe this thing can actually help us.
HAMZA|Let's take it with us. We'll head back and figure out what to do next.
HAMZA|Well then. Looks like I'll have to cross the Desert of Death alone.
HAMZA|Ugh... Kalba... My head's still pounding like crazy. But I can see fine - think I'll manage to cross the desert. Unless those madmen show up again…
